caption.p: Biomarker discovery in Cluster 2. ( a) Volcano plot showing the upregulated markers in Cluster 2. These markers were detected using binomial differential expression. ( b) Network of downregulated DEGs in Cluster 2. ( c) PCA plot visualizing cells labeled based on their cluster ID and color-coded based on the expression of TYMS. ( d) Schematic figure explaining the RPART decision tree to predict the cluster identity of a target cell to belong to Cluster 2 or 3.
